attributes.action: Inquiry needed into all donations accepted by the Conservative Party.
attributes.background: Recently it has been revealed a high ranking Cabinet minister in the Conservative party accepted donations from a Russian national. The extent & source of all non UK donations to this party need to be investigated and revealed.

rejection.details:
The Electoral Commission is the independent regulator of political party finances. You can find out more here:

https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/our-work/roles-and-responsibilities/our-role-as-regulator-of-political-party-finances
